lead_paragraph: This documentary looks in on people working in yarn, from artists making graffiti to those fashioning playground structures.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Yarn’: And You Thought It Was Just for Knitting Mittens
headline.main: Review: ‘Yarn’: And You Thought It Was Just for Knitting Mittens

snippet: This documentary looks in on people working in yarn, from artists making graffiti to those fashioning playground structures.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Una Lorenzen documentary film Yarn.
